This is the starting page of Primordial Machine's development section.
Primordial Machine is a Game and its Engine *in the making*.
The source of this project is made available publicly in our [GithHub Repository](https://github.com/primordialmachine/primordialmachine).
You can also download the latest [prebuild binaries](https://github.com/primordialmachine/primordialmachine/releases/latest).
